obstruction.translation[0].definitions[0: when something blocks a road, passage, tube etc, or the thing that blocks it
an operation to remove an obstruction from her throat
Police can remove a vehicle that is causing an obstruction.
an unlawful obstruction of the highway
obstruction.translation[0].definitions[1: when someone or something prevents or delays a legal or political process
He was found guilty of obstruction of justice.
obstruction.translation[0].definitions[2: an offence in football, hockey etc in which a player gets between an opponent and the ball
